#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Introduction =

I have no goals to make any super-game or super-engine. This project started only as test project. And now it is my platform for different experiments.
What is Isilme? It means "moon light" in Quenya.
Nowdays it is bad-documented but I wish it to be better

= Details =

I tried to split the engine in different parts. Each game entity contains
 - Graphics model
 - Body model
 - Behaviour model

The Isilme Engine uses some open-source components
 - Lua as scripting engine
 - HGE for graphics
 - Squall for sound
 - Guichan for GUI
 - TinyXML for XML managing
It also uses Boost to be safer and cleverer
